name: F-15 Eagle

description: Advanced fifth-generation multirole fighter used by multiple U.S. services and allies.

name: Next Gen Aerial Refueling (NGAS)
description: An advanced refueling concept supporting next-generation combat operations.

name: CJADC2
description: The Combined Joint All-Domain Command and Control (CJADC2) system is designed to enhance joint operations by integrating data from various military branches and allies, enabling real-time decision-making and improved situational awareness.

name: Link 16
description: Link 16 is a secure, jam-resistant tactical data link used by military forces to enable real-time exchange of situational awareness data, including radar tracks and targeting information, across air, land, and sea platforms. It supports networked warfare by connecting assets like aircraft, ships, and ground units, facilitating coordinated operations and command-and-control functions. Its standardized protocol ensures interoperability among NATO and allied forces, enhancing joint mission effectiveness.
